title: Software Engineer Intern @Atlassian, Sydney
description: I worked as a cloud microservice engineer as part of Atlassian's PaaS. My focus was on implementing synthetic testing and alerts for serverless systems on AWS. I used AWS, Kotlin + Spring Boot, Node.js.

title: Software Engineer Intern @Infosys, India
description: I completed a Robotics intership in India with Infosys, a global IT company. I researched and implemented a co-operative pathfinding algorithm in low-cost robotics.

title: Cyber Security Intern @Cympire, Israel
description: I wrote a fully automated Windows Kerberos Vulnerability exploit in C. I also created an Azure infrastructure to execute this vulnerability on, able to be automatically deployed through PowerShell.
